com.powerdata.openpa

Interface BusRefIndex

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusRefIndexI

    public interface BusRefIndex
    Provide bus indexes from equipment lists. For use with applications that make use of indexes rather than objects Note that indexes are always based in the list derived from the model, either getBuses() or getSingleBus(), depending on how it is configured

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BusRefIndex.BusFunction
      Function that takes a list and index, and return a Bus object
      static class  BusRefIndex.TwoTerm
      Return object for both bus indexes of a list of two-terminal devices
